parameter.value: Hello |PLAYERNAME|. I am an specialist on flower care.
I am selling a very special flower pot, you will have to take care of it to make it sprout beautiful.
I am selling the most unique seeds in this server! They sprout the most beutiful flowers you can get!
I have an special watering can that will help you to water the pot, its recomanded to put the seeds in the pot, then water it to make it sprout.
In order to take care of your flower, you need a pot, some seeds which will become the flower, and a watering can in order to water the pot.
